attributes.action: Ban all forms of Amyl Nitrate, also known as poppers, and it's derivatives,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Evil, hell, death and dementia action all in one inconspicuous little brown bottle. It's Cheap, nasty and downright wrong...  That's right folks... it's Poppers! Don't be fooled by its innocuous appearance, one bottle of this stuff could strip the paint off Blackpool Tower - Can you believe it's actually legal? Let's get rid of it once and for all and send it back henceforth to the pound shops from whence it came!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
